sentences.english: 1328 - Philip VI is crowned King of France.
sentences.chinese: 1328年的今天，腓力六世加冕成为法兰西国王。

sentences.english: In 1717 he captured a large French merchantman ship. He made this a powerful ship by putting forty guns on her and named her the "Queen Anne's Revenge".
sentences.chinese: 1717年，他捕获了一艘大型的法兰西商船。

sentences.english: Bristol is in the west of England.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托尔位于英兰西。

sentences.english: 1852 - Napoleon III becomes Emperor of France.
sentences.chinese: 1852年，拿破仑三世成为法兰西的皇帝。

sentences.english: Evidently, Frances and I were to eat in here, by ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 终于，我和法兰西斯要在这里一起吃饭了。

sentences.english: Frances is the spitting image of her beautiful mother.
sentences.chinese: 法兰西斯真是她漂亮妈咪的翻版哪。

sentences.english: When French femmes fatales appear on the silver screen, we seem to be almost embraced by a pleasant fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕法兰西美女仅出现在荧幕上，就带来袭人暗香。

sentences.english: She touched his arm and called him ‘Francis’.
sentences.chinese: 她摸着他的胳膊，叫他“弗兰西斯”。

sentences.english: Union of Transylvania with Romania was ratified in 1920.
sentences.chinese: 1920年，特兰西瓦尼亚与罗马尼亚的结盟被批准。

sentences.english: The year is AD 1096. The place, the kingdom of France.
sentences.chinese: 这里是法兰西王国，现在是公元1096年。

sentences.english: She says, I am the great great grand cousin of the queen of France.
sentences.chinese: 她说，我是法兰西皇后的远远远房表亲。

sentences.english: In 1984 he became the first black inducted into the Académie Française.
sentences.chinese: 1984年成为加入法兰西学院的第一位黑人。

sentences.english: "Where are you going?" I asked Frances.
The French Revolution is the consecration of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 法兰西革命是人类无上的光荣。

sentences.english: 1328 - King Philip VI of France is crowned.
sentences.chinese: 1328年的今天，法兰西国王菲利浦六世加冕。

sentences.english: Francis translated that French novel by himself.
sentences.chinese: 法兰西斯独力翻译那本文法文小说。
